titleStmt.title: Independency examined, vnmasked, refuted, by twelve new particular interrogatories: detecting both the manifold absurdities, inconveniences that must necessarily attend it, to the great disturbance of church, state, the diminution, subversion of the lawfull undoubted power of all christian magistrates, parliaments, synods: and shaking the chiefe pillars, wherwith its patrons would support it. / By William Prynne of Lincolnes Inne, Esquier.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

titleStmt.title: Independency examined, vnmasked, refuted, by twelve new particular interrogatories: detecting both the manifold absurdities, inconveniences that must necessarily attend it, to the great disturbance of church, state, the diminution, subversion of the lawfull undoubted power of all christian magistrates, parliaments, synods: and shaking the chiefe pillars, wherwith its patrons would support it. / By William Prynne of Lincolnes Inne, Esquier.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F.L. for Michael Sparke Senior, and are to be sold at the Blew-Bible in Green-Arbour.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
